name: Last Message (2018)
description:
Can something be so terrifying as to drive anyone crazy just hearing reports? It all starts when someone sends you a message from their friend's cell phone, asking for help to escape from a situation as complicated as it is obscure. Among the many options, choose the ones that seem most appropriate and follow the course of history, guiding a complete stranger through underground tunnels. Pass creatures capable of inspiring madness in the eyes of the beholder. Choosing options can change not only the course of the game's story, but also who you are in it. Look for the way out or get lost in the process.

The game is short, but has several references inspired by the tales of HP Lovecraft.

  • 8 different possible endings (+1 secret ending), on intertwining paths.

  • 31 achievements that can be unlocked throughout the story.
